metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6508 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the url_parse function in url.c in Wget through 1.19.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers via CRLF sequences in the host subcomponent of a URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.15-1ubuntu1.14.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.15-1ubuntu1.14.04.3').
